additionalDocs: Austrian residence certificate (‘Meldebestätigung’) with a registered ‘Hauptwohnsitz’ - if you or your partner live in Austria (this should also be used as proof of address)
Austria.localRequirements:
Before you apply you must have a confirmed date for your ceremony from your registry office (Standesamt) in Austria.  
If you or your partner are legally resident in Austria, the proof of residence must be an Austrian residence certificate (‘Meldebestätigung’) with a registered ‘Hauptwohnsitz’.

additionalDocs: premarital medical certificate
partner’s premarital medical certificate
if you live in Benin - your residence certificate (this serves as your proof of address)
copy of your witness's passport or national identity card
Benin.localRequirements:
There are no British consular facilities that will issue a CNI in Benin. 
You will need to travel to the British High Commission Accra in Ghana to give notice and collect your CNI.

Bolivia.localRequirements: You will also need to give the registrar in Bolivia a legalised (apostilled) birth certificate. You need to [apply for legalisation separately](https://www.gov.uk/get-document-legalised).

additionalDocs: partner’s residence permit
premarital medical certificate
if you live in Burkino Faso - your residence certificate (this serves as your proof of address)
copy of your witness's passport or national identity card
evidence that your partner is free to marry (either a document from their government or their passport showing they're unmarried)
Cambodia.localRequirements: The person conducting your ceremony should tell you to contact either the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Interior or the local commune/Sangkat. They can confirm if you need a marital status affirmation to get married in Cambodia.

Central African Republic.post: British Embassy Kinshasa (for Central African Republic)
Central African Republic.localRequirements: There are no British consular facilities that will issue a CNI in the Central African Republic. You will need to travel to the British Embassy Kinshasa in the Democratic Republic of the Congo to give notice and collect your CNI.

Colombia.localRequirements: You may need to provide a legalised (apostilled) birth certificate translated into Spanish. You need to [apply for legalisation separately](https://www.gov.uk/get-document-legalised).

Congo.localRequirements: There are no British consular facilities that will issue a CNI in Congo. You will need to travel to the British Embassy Kinshasa in the Democratic Republic of the Congo to give notice and collect your CNI.

additionalDocs: religious belief
annual salary

if you or your partner live in Estonia - you can use your extract from the [Estonian Population Register](www.eesti.ee/en/family/release-of-data-from-the-population-register/extract-from-the-population-register) as your proof of address

Finland.duration: around 3 months (check with local marriage authorities)
additionalDocs: residence permit card issued by Finnish Immigration Service (or equivalent for the country you live in) – this serves as your proof of address
partner's DVV certificate (this can also be their proof of address)
Finland.localRequirements:
To apply for an affirmation in Finland you must live outside the UK. Upload your residence permit card as your proof of address and bring it to your appointment. If you cannot prove that you are resident outside the UK do not apply for this service.  
If you live in the UK, you'll need to [give notice](https://www.gov.uk/marriages-civil-partnerships/give-notice) at a UK register office to get a certificate of no impediment (CNI). [Follow the guidance for British nationals living in the UK](https://www.gov.uk/marriage-abroad) to find out how to apply.

Honduras.localRequirements: There are no British consular facilities that will issue a CNI in Honduras. You will need to travel to the British Embassy Guatemala City in Guatemala to give notice and collect your CNI.

Latvia.localRequirements: Your partner must attend your appointment with you.

additionalDocs: partner's full birth certificate or naturalisation certificate

Nicaragua.localRequirements:
There are no British consular facilities that will issue a CNI in Nicaragua.  
You will need to travel to the British Embassy San Jose in Costa Rica to give notice and collect your CNI.

additionalDocs: proof you live in Norway (this should also be your proof of address)
Norway.localRequirements:
Appointments are only available at the British Embassy Oslo. You will need to travel to Oslo for your appointment.  
To apply for an affirmation you must be a resident in Norway. Your proof of address must be issued by a Norwegian Authority. If you cannot prove that you are a Norwegian resident do not apply for this service.  
If you live in the UK, you'll need to [give notice](https://www.gov.uk/marriages-civil-partnerships/give-notice) at a UK register office to get a certificate of no impediment (CNI). [Follow the guidance for British nationals living in the UK](https://www.gov.uk/marriage-abroad) to find out how to apply.

Peru.localRequirements: You will also need to provide your legalised (apostilled) birth certificate. You need to [apply for legalisation separately](https://www.gov.uk/get-document-legalised).

Poland.postAddress:
Consular Section 
British Embassy 
ul. Kawalerii 12 
00-468 Warsaw 
Mazowieckie
Poland.localRequirements: You can apply before you have confirmed the final place and date of your ceremony. When asked in your online application, enter the estimated date and rough location within Poland.

Philippines.localRequirements:
Once you’ve applied online, print out either an [affirmation](https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/media/6583f40f23b70a0013234d53/Affirmation_of_Marital_Status.odt) (if you want to make a non-religious declaration) or [affidavit](https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/media/6583f3fc23b70a000d234d53/Affidavit_of_Marital_Status.odt) (religious). Fill in your details by hand but do not sign yet. You must bring your completed form with you to your appointment at your embassy or consulate and sign it then.  
You must be a resident outside of the UK to apply for this service. If you live in the UK, you need to [apply for a UK CNI](/before-you-start/apply-for-uk-cni?marriage.country=Philippines) before travelling to the Philippines.

additionalDocs: partner's proof any previous marriages or civil partnerships have ended
Senegal.localRequirements: Your partner must attend your appointment with you.

Spain.postAddress:
British Consulate-General Madrid 
Notarial Services 
Torre Emperador Castellana 
Paseo de la Castellana 259D 
28046 Madrid
Spain.duration: 3 or 6 months (check with the person conducting your ceremony)
Spain.localRequirements: You should apply for your local CNI 3 months before your civil registry appointment, or your wedding date if you’re holding a religious ceremony first and registering the marriage at the civil registry afterwards.

Suriname.localRequirements:
There are no British consular facilities that will issue a CNI in Suriname. 
You will need to travel to the British High Commission Georgetown in Guyana to give notice and collect your CNI.

Sweden.postAddress:
British Embassy 
Consular Section 
Box 27819 
115 93 Stockholm
additionalDocs: partner's extract from the population register (if they're registered in Sweden)
Sweden.localRequirements:
Only apply for this service if are not registered in the Swedish population register. If you are registered you should not need a CNI to get married. Check with the [Swedish Tax Authorities](https://www.skatteverket.se/privat.4.76a43be412206334b89800052864.html). 
 If you live in the UK you should [apply for a CNI from a UK register office](https://prove-eligibility-foreign-government.forms.fcodev.org.uk/exchange-uk-cni/check-eligibility-and-documents?marriage.country=Sweden) unless you have already travelled to Sweden.

Tanzania.post: British High Commission Dar es Salaam

additionalDocs: premarital medical certificate
partner’s premarital medical certificate
if you live in Togo - your residence certificate (this serves as your proof of address)
copy of your witness's passport or national identity card
Togo.localRequirements:
There are no British consular facilities that will issue a CNI in Togo. 
You will need to travel to the British High Commission Accra in Ghana to give notice and collect your CNI.

additionalDocs: partner’s CNI

Indonesia.duration: 3 months (you should confirm this with the local authority)

additionalDocs: test field additional doc
test field additional doc

Russia.duration: 3 to 12 months (check with the person conducting your ceremony)
additionalDocs: Russian spelling of your full name as you want it to appear on your CNI (it needs to be consistent across all the documents you submit to the Russian authorities)
if you're not a Russian resident - either your residence registration slip issued by migration authorities or the rental agreement with your name for your private accommodation in Russia

Vietnam.duration: 3 or 6 months (check with the local People's Committee)
additionalDocs: partner's birth certificate
Vietnam.localRequirements: Your proof of any previous marriages having ended (for example your divorce absolute or partner's death certificate) must be legalised if they were issued in the UK. You need to [apply for legalisation separately](https://www.gov.uk/get-document-legalised).

British Embassy Moscow.postAddress:
British Embassy Moscow 
121099 Moscow 
Smolenskaya Naberezhnaya 10

British Consulate General Ho Chi Minh Ci.post: British Consulate General Ho Chi Minh City
